I was the first to achieve it since the year 2000

I've been the highest scoring Brazilian in a Champions League season.
During my mid-twenties I decided to move to a club in China managed by Scolari, a team which included national teammate Paulinho

I'm part of a treble winning team which includes winning the Champions League.
Players I have played with include Can, Xhaka & Salah

I've won the Champions League on consecutive years.
I've scored over 10 goals in the competition

I've lost in the final of both the Champions League and World Cup in the same year.
Although I managed to win the Champions League in my next final, my national team went one worse and finished third at the following World Cup

I've won a Champions League having got on the scoresheet in the final.
Some of my other trophies include an FA Cup and Ligue 1 win

I have a Champions League title to my name and I'm the second most capped player for my country.
Other titles I've won include the Premier League and La Liga

I've won the Champions League and have been a runner up in the FIFA World Cup.
Other achievements include winning the top-flight Greek, Spanish and Dutch leagues

I'm in the top 10 Champions League goalscorers of all time, but I've never won the competition.
I've also been included in the Champions League Squad of the Season on at least two occasions

I've won 6 domestic top-flight titles, but my greatest team achievement quite possibly is winning the Champions League.
The furthest I have got with my country in a FIFA World Cup is the Semi-finals
